price: Watakapo tupwa humo watausikia mngurumo wake na huku inafoka.
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ
footnotes: Wakitiwa humo watasikia sauti mbaya ya kuchusha, na huo moto unatokota kwa ukali,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
